sig_info: Gain an indefinite Passive Prowess increasing Special Attack damage by 5 to 21.25% when a personal Stun or Poison, or the Stun from the Parry Mastery, is Purified or fails to trigger due to immunities. Max 10 stacks.
At 10 Prowess, consume all Prowess to inflict a Passive Stun for 2 seconds when a Poison fails to trigger due to immunity. This effect cannot interrupt a Special Attack.
Gain 50 to 85% Passive Stun duration if triggered by a Tongue Attack.

ALWAYS ACTIVE: Toad is immune to Poison and his regeneration rate cannot be decreased or increased by outside sources.
7% chance when Struck to inflict a Paralytic Poison Debuff. Being Struck with Critical Hits has a 40% chance.
TONGUE ATTACKS: Toad attacks using his Prehensile Tongue on his Second Medium, Special 1, and Special 2 Attacks.
100% chance to inflict a Paralytic Poison Debuff on Contact.
PARALYTIC POISON - MAX 10 STACKS: Deals 66.4 direct damage over 30 seconds, and reduces health recovery by 30%. Paralytic Poisons count as Poison Debuffs.
Dashing Forward or dashing backwards Purifies one of Toad’s personal Paralytic Poison Debuffs. This effect cannot happen more than once every 2 seconds.
70% chance to inflict a Paralytic Poison Passive when Purified by Skill Champions.
AT MAX PARALYTIC POISON: Convert all personal Poisons into a Paralytic Poison Passive, dealing 24.9 direct damage over 8 seconds. Deals an additional 24.9 for each Prowess effect and cannot be removed by Dashing.
Inflict a Stun Passive for 2 seconds. This effect goes on cooldown for 10 seconds. This effect will not interrupt a Special Attack.
HEAVY ATTACKS: Consume 1 Poison Debuff to deal 49.8 as a burst of Physical damage.
PARALYTIC SECRETION - MAX 3 STACKS: If Toad is Struck while he is near a wall, Toad begins to secrete paralysing toxins and gains a Regeneration Passive healing 5% of missing health over 8 seconds. +1% Regeneration Potency for every hit on the Opponent’s Combo Meter up to 15 hits.
Critical Hits, Bleeds and Incinerate Debuffs also have a 20% chance to trigger Paralytic Secretion. Against Skill champions this ability gains +50% chance.
40% chance to inflict Paralytic Poison on contact while Paralytic Secretion is active.
Gain an indefinite Passive Prowess increasing Special Attack damage by 70% when Paralytic Secretion is activated. Max 5 Stacks.
Toad’s Attacks pause the duration of Paralytic Secretion for 0.50 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: If the Opponent is suffering from Toad’s personal Stun effects, deal 190.9 as a burst of Poison Damage.
Removes all personal Prowess Passives.
The last hit inflicts a Slow Debuff for 25 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: Inflict a Paralytic Poison Passive dealing 83 direct damage over 25 seconds. Deals an additional 83 for each Prowess effect and cannot be removed by Dashing.
Removes all personal Prowess Passives.

Dashing Forward or dashing backwards Purifies one of Toad’s personal Paralytic Poison Debuffs. This effect cannot happen more than once every 2 seconds.
70% chance to inflict a Paralytic Poison Passive when Purified by Skill Champions.
AT MAX PARALYTIC POISON: Convert all personal Poisons into a Paralytic Poison Passive, dealing 32.7 direct damage over 8 seconds. Deals an additional 32.7 for each Prowess effect and cannot be removed by Dashing.
Inflict a Stun Passive for 2 seconds. This effect goes on cooldown for 10 seconds. This effect will not interrupt a Special Attack.
HEAVY ATTACKS: Consume 1 Poison Debuff to deal 65.4 as a burst of Physical damage.

Critical Hits, Bleeds and Incinerate Debuffs also have a 20% chance to trigger Paralytic Secretion. Against Skill champions this ability gains +50% chance.
40% chance to inflict Paralytic Poison on contact while Paralytic Secretion is active.
Gain an indefinite Passive Prowess increasing Special Attack damage by 70% when Paralytic Secretion is activated. Max 5 Stacks.
Toad’s Attacks pause the duration of Paralytic Secretion for 0.50 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: If the Opponent is suffering from Toad’s personal Stun effects, deal 250.7 as a burst of Poison Damage.
Removes all personal Prowess Passives.
The last hit inflicts a Slow Debuff for 25 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: Inflict a Paralytic Poison Passive dealing 109 direct damage over 25 seconds. Deals an additional 109 for each Prowess effect and cannot be removed by Dashing.
Removes all personal Prowess Passives.

AT MAX PARALYTIC POISON: Convert all personal Poisons into a Paralytic Poison Passive, dealing 258.3 direct damage over 8 seconds. Deals an additional 258.3 for each Prowess effect and cannot be removed by Dashing.
Inflict a Stun Passive for 2 seconds. This effect goes on cooldown for 10 seconds. This effect will not interrupt a Special Attack.
HEAVY ATTACKS: Consume 1 Poison Debuff to deal 516.6 as a burst of Physical damage.
PARALYTIC SECRETION - MAX 3 STACKS: If Toad is Struck while he is near a wall, Toad begins to secrete paralysing toxins and gains a Regeneration Passive healing 5% of missing health over 8 seconds. +1% Regeneration Potency for every hit on the Opponent’s Combo Meter up to 15 hits.
Critical Hits, Bleeds and Incinerate Debuffs also have a 20% chance to trigger Paralytic Secretion. Against Skill champions this ability gains +50% chance.
40% chance to inflict Paralytic Poison on contact while Paralytic Secretion is active.
Gain an indefinite Passive Prowess increasing Special Attack damage by 70% when Paralytic Secretion is activated. Max 5 Stacks.
Toad’s Attacks pause the duration of Paralytic Secretion for 0.50 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: If the Opponent is suffering from Toad’s personal Stun effects, deal 1980.3 as a burst of Poison Damage.
Removes all personal Prowess Passives.
The last hit inflicts a Slow Debuff for 25 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: Inflict a Paralytic Poison Passive dealing 861 direct damage over 25 seconds. Deals an additional 861 for each Prowess effect and cannot be removed by Dashing.
Removes all personal Prowess Passives.

sig_info: Gain an indefinite Passive Prowess increasing Special Attack damage by 5 to 21.25% when a personal Stun or Poison, or the Stun from the Parry Mastery, is Purified or fails to trigger due to immunities. Max 10 stacks.
At 10 Prowess, consume all Prowess to inflict a Passive Stun for 2 seconds when a Poison fails to trigger due to immunity. This effect cannot interrupt a Special Attack.
Gain 50 to 85% Passive Stun duration if triggered by a Tongue Attack.

ALWAYS ACTIVE: Toad is immune to Poison and his regeneration rate cannot be decreased or increased by outside sources.

SPECIAL ATTACK 2: If the Opponent is suffering from Toad’s personal Stun effects, deal 7803.9 as a burst of Poison Damage.
Removes all personal Prowess Passives.
The last hit inflicts a Slow Debuff for 25 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: Inflict a Paralytic Poison Passive dealing 3393 direct damage over 25 seconds. Deals an additional 3393 for each Prowess effect and cannot be removed by Dashing.
Removes all personal Prowess Passives.

sig_info: Gain an indefinite Passive Prowess increasing Special Attack damage by 5 to 25% when a personal Stun or Poison, or the Stun from the Parry Mastery, is Purified or fails to trigger due to immunities. Max 10 stacks.
At 10 Prowess, consume all Prowess to inflict a Passive Stun for 2 seconds when a Poison fails to trigger due to immunity. This effect cannot interrupt a Special Attack.
Gain 50 to 100% Passive Stun duration if triggered by a Tongue Attack.

ALWAYS ACTIVE: Toad is immune to Poison and his regeneration rate cannot be decreased or increased by outside sources.
7% chance when Struck to inflict a Paralytic Poison Debuff. Being Struck with Critical Hits has a 40% chance.
TONGUE ATTACKS: Toad attacks using his Prehensile Tongue on his Second Medium, Special 1, and Special 2 Attacks.
100% chance to inflict a Paralytic Poison Debuff on Contact.
PARALYTIC POISON - MAX 10 STACKS: Deals 3141.6 direct damage over 30 seconds, and reduces health recovery by 30%. Paralytic Poisons count as Poison Debuffs.
Dashing Forward or dashing backwards Purifies one of Toad’s personal Paralytic Poison Debuffs. This effect cannot happen more than once every 2 seconds.
70% chance to inflict a Paralytic Poison Passive when Purified by Skill Champions.
AT MAX PARALYTIC POISON: Convert all personal Poisons into a Paralytic Poison Passive, dealing 1178.1 direct damage over 8 seconds. Deals an additional 1178.1 for each Prowess effect and cannot be removed by Dashing.
Inflict a Stun Passive for 2 seconds. This effect goes on cooldown for 10 seconds. This effect will not interrupt a Special Attack.
HEAVY ATTACKS: Consume 1 Poison Debuff to deal 2356.2 as a burst of Physical damage.
PARALYTIC SECRETION - MAX 3 STACKS: If Toad is Struck while he is near a wall, Toad begins to secrete paralysing toxins and gains a Regeneration Passive healing 5% of missing health over 8 seconds. +1% Regeneration Potency for every hit on the Opponent’s Combo Meter up to 15 hits.
Critical Hits, Bleeds and Incinerate Debuffs also have a 20% chance to trigger Paralytic Secretion. Against Skill champions this ability gains +50% chance.
40% chance to inflict Paralytic Poison on contact while Paralytic Secretion is active.
Gain an indefinite Passive Prowess increasing Special Attack damage by 70% when Paralytic Secretion is activated. Max 5 Stacks.
Toad’s Attacks pause the duration of Paralytic Secretion for 0.50 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: If the Opponent is suffering from Toad’s personal Stun effects, deal 9032.1 as a burst of Poison Damage.
Removes all personal Prowess Passives.
The last hit inflicts a Slow Debuff for 25 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: Inflict a Paralytic Poison Passive dealing 3927 direct damage over 25 seconds. Deals an additional 3927 for each Prowess effect and cannot be removed by Dashing.
Removes all personal Prowess Passives.
